Package hardwareStore

Class Scaner

java.lang.Object
hardwareStore.Technique
hardwareStore.Scaner
public class Scaner extends Technique
A class containing information about scanners.
Parameters: model, scanSpeed and maxResolution.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lyutova Anna

    • Scaner

      public Scaner​(String firm_temp, int price_temp, String model_temp, int ss_temp, String mr_temp)
      Class scanner constructor with params.
      Parameters:
      firm_temp - temporary parameter of the company name.
      price_temp - temporary parameter of scanners's price.
      model_temp - temporary parameter of scanners's model.
      ss_temp - temporary parameter of scanners's scanning speed.
      mr_temp - temporary parameter of scanners's max resolution.
      See Also:
      Scaner()
